casebody.data:
99-0219 (La. 4/1/99)

McKinley KELLER v. Carol AYMOND, Jr., et al. Michael J. Johnson v. Carol Aymond, Jr., et al. No. 99-0219. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Avoyelles Publishing Co.; De-cuir, Randy; — Defendant(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Number CA98-0843, CA98-0844; Parish of Avoyelles 12th Judicial District Court Div. “B” Number 96-3590, 97-3663

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J., and LEMMON and VICTORY, JJ. would grant the writ. KNOLL, J. not on panel; recused.
